org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.xpath
Class AeXPathContext

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.xpath.AeXPathContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeFunctionExecutionContext
public class AeXPathContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeFunctionExecutionContext

Provides a runtime evaluation context for calling expression functions. It wraps the jaxen runtime function context.

Field Summary

          The jaxen context.
